languages.text: Гемункул Тервантьяс Архимахинатор, мастер плоти и боли, повержен вместе со своими омерзительными творениями. К сожалению, в лаборатории не сохранилось ничего, что могло бы представлять интерес для Вольного Торговца, но гибель гемункула несомненно принесет покой не только системе, но и всему Простору Коронус.

traits.locale_text: Гемункул Тервантьяс Архимахинатор, мастер плоти и боли повержен вместе со своими омерзительными творениям. К сожалению, в лаборатории не сохранилось ничего, что могло бы представлять интерес для Вольного Торговца, но гибель гемункула несомненно принесет покой не только системе, но и всему Простору Коронус.

languages.text: Tervantias the Archmachinator, Haemonculus, master of flesh and pain, has been vanquished along with his abhorrent creations. Alas, there was nothing in his laboratory that could be of interest to the Rogue Trader. Nevertheless, the Haemonculus's death is a true blessing for both the system and the Koronus Expanse as a whole.
languages.original_text: Гемункул Тервантьяс Архимахинатор, мастер плоти и боли, повержен вместе со своими омерзительными творениями. К сожалению, в лаборатории не сохранилось ничего, что могло бы представлять интерес для Вольного Торговца, но гибель гемункула несомненно принесет покой не только системе, но и всему Простору Коронус.

traits.locale_text: Tervantias the Archmachinator, Haemonculus, master of flesh and pain, was defeated along with his abhorrent creations. Alas, there was nothing in his laboratory that could be of interest to the Rogue Trader. Nevertheless, the Haemonculus's death is a true blessing for both the system and the Koronus Expanse as a whole.

Nevertheless, the Haemonculus's death is a true blessing for both the system and the Koronus Expanse as a whole.

Alas, there was nothing in his laboratory that could be of interest to the Rogue Trader. Tervantias the Archmachinator, Haemonculus, master of flesh and pain, has been vanquished along with his abhorrent creations. Alas, there was nothing in his laboratory that could be of interest to the Rogue Trader. Nevertheless, the Haemonculus's death is a true blessing for both the system and the Koronus Expanse as a whole.

languages.text: Tervantias l'Archmachinateur, hémoncule et maître de la chair et de la douleur, a été anéanti, de même que ses ignobles créations. Il n'y avait rien d'intéressant pour {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} dans le laboratoire, mais la mort de l'hémoncule est une véritable bénédiction pour le système et même l'ensemble des Étendues de Koronus.
languages.original_text: Tervantias the Archmachinator, Haemonculus, master of flesh and pain, has been vanquished along with his abhorrent creations. Alas, there was nothing in his laboratory that could be of interest to the Rogue Trader. Nevertheless, the Haemonculus's death is a true blessing for both the system and the Koronus Expanse as a whole.

traits.locale_text: Tervantias l'Archmachinateur, hémoncule et maître de la chair et de la douleur, a été anéanti, de même que ses ignobles créations. Il n'y avait rien d'intéressant pour {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} dans le laboratoire, mais la mort de l'hémoncule est une véritable bénédiction pour le système et même l'ensemble des Étendues de Koronus.

languages.text: 行商浪人消灭了血伶人特万提亚斯，血肉与痛苦的大师，也消灭了他创造出来的那些怪物。遗憾的是，他的实验室里没有任何东西能引起行商浪人的兴趣，但即便如此，对整个星系与科罗努斯扩区而言，这个血伶人的死也是件真正的幸事。
languages.original_text: Tervantias the Archmachinator, Haemonculus, master of flesh and pain, has been vanquished along with his abhorrent creations. Alas, there was nothing in his laboratory that could be of interest to the Rogue Trader. Nevertheless, the Haemonculus's death is a true blessing for both the system and the Koronus Expanse as a whole.

traits.locale_text: 行商浪人消灭了血伶人特万提亚斯，血肉与痛苦的大师，也消灭了他创造出来的那些怪物。遗憾的是，他的实验室里没有任何东西能引起行商浪人的兴趣，但即便如此，对整个星系与科罗努斯扩区而言，这个血伶人的死也是件真正的幸事。

languages.text: アーチマキネイターのテルヴァンティアス、ハモンキュラス、屍肉と苦痛の主は、その忌まわしい創造物とともに滅ぼされて絶やされた。残念なことに、彼の研究所には自由開拓者の興味を引きそうなものは何も残されていなかった。とはいえ、ハモンキュラスの死は、星系にとってもコロヌス・エクスパンス全域にとっても、まさに幸いこの上ないことである。
languages.original_text: Tervantias the Archmachinator, Haemonculus, master of flesh and pain, has been vanquished along with his abhorrent creations. Alas, there was nothing in his laboratory that could be of interest to the Rogue Trader. Nevertheless, the Haemonculus's death is a true blessing for both the system and the Koronus Expanse as a whole.

traits.locale_text: アーチマキネイターのテルヴァンティアス、ハモンキュラス、屍肉と苦痛の主は、その忌まわしい創造物とともに滅ぼされて絶やされた。残念なことに、彼の研究所には自由開拓者の興味を引きそうなものは何も残されていなかった。とはいえ、ハモンキュラスの死は、星系にとってもコロヌス・エクスパンス全域にとっても、まさに幸いこの上ないことである。

languages.text: Tervantias der Erzmachinator, Haemonculus, Meister von Fleisch und Schmerz, wurde gemeinsam mit seinen grauenhaften Schöpfungen besiegt. Leider befand sich in seinem Laboratorium nichts, was für {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} von Interesse gewesen wäre. Dennoch ist der Tod des Haemonculus ein wahrer Segen sowohl für das System als auch für die gesamte Koronus-Ausdehnung.
languages.original_text: Tervantias the Archmachinator, Haemonculus, master of flesh and pain, has been vanquished along with his abhorrent creations. Alas, there was nothing in his laboratory that could be of interest to the Rogue Trader. Nevertheless, the Haemonculus's death is a true blessing for both the system and the Koronus Expanse as a whole.

traits.locale_text: Tervantias der Erzmachinator, HHaemonculus, Meister von Fleisch und Schmerz, wurde gemeinsam mit seinen grauenhaften Schöpfungen besiegt. Leider befand sich in seinem Laboratorium nichts, was für {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} von Interesse gewesen wäre. Dennoch ist der Tod des Haemonculus ein wahrer Segen sowohl für das System als auch für die gesamte Koronus-Ausdehnung.

languages.text: Tervantias el Archimaquinador, Hemónculo, el maestro de la carne y del dolor, ha muerto junto con sus aborrecibles creaciones. Lamentablemente, no había nada en su laboratorio que fuese del interés de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente. Sin embargo, la muerte del Hemónculo es una verdadera bendición tanto para el sistema como para la Extensión de Koronus en su totalidad.
languages.original_text: Tervantias the Archmachinator, Haemonculus, master of flesh and pain, has been vanquished along with his abhorrent creations. Alas, there was nothing in his laboratory that could be of interest to the Rogue Trader. Nevertheless, the Haemonculus's death is a true blessing for both the system and the Koronus Expanse as a whole.

traits.locale_text: Tervantias el Archimaquinador, Hemónculo, el maestro de la carne y del dolor, ha muerto junto con sus aborrecibles creaciones. Lamentablemente, no había nada en su laboratorio que fuese del interés de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente. Sin embargo, la muerte del Hemónculo es una verdadera bendición tanto para el sistema como para la Extensión de Koronus en su totalidad.

languages.text: Et ve acı üstadı Haimonkulus Başmakinatör Tervantias, menfur yaratımlarıyla birlikte yok edildi. Ne yazık ki laboratuvarında Hür Tacir'in ilgisini çekebilecek hiçbir şey yok. Yine de Haimonkulus'un ölümü, hem sistem hem de Koronus Enginliği için gerçek bir lütuf.
languages.original_text: Tervantias the Archmachinator, Haemonculus, master of flesh and pain, has been vanquished along with his abhorrent creations. Alas, there was nothing in his laboratory that could be of interest to the Rogue Trader. Nevertheless, the Haemonculus's death is a true blessing for both the system and the Koronus Expanse as a whole.
